message.item.tinygates.tiny_and_gate: §7Outputs to front when a signal is received to both left AND right side.§r
message.item.tinygates.tiny_or_gate: §7Outputs to front when a signal is received to either left OR right side.§r
message.item.tinygates.tiny_xor_gate: §7Outputs to front when the input signals do not match, similar to a 3-way light switch.§r
message.item.tinygates.tiny_not_gate: §7Outputs to front when there is no signal to the back. Similar to redstone torch but to single direction with no delay.§r
message.item.tinygates.tiny_rs_latch: §7Outputs to front when signal on left (Set signal) is pulsed. Remains on until signal on right (Reset signal) is pulsed.§r
message.item.tinygates.tiny_t_flip_flop: §7Output to front toggles on pulse to back..§r
